publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1836 Tommy Sheridan: Failure to Tackle Foot-and-Mouth Disease—That the Parliament believes that the current policies of the Scottish Executive are failing to solve the problem of foot-and-mouth disease and therefore calls upon the Executive to abandon these policies and adopt a new, environmentally friendly, holistic policy which includes vaccination, a switch to organic farming, local slaughter and the sale of animals to local retailers to end the transportation of live animals the length and breadth of the country.
